lyrics:
9 contributorson fire lyricsverse 1
they tell you where you need to go
they tell you when you need to leave
they tell you what you need to know
they tell you who you need to be

prechorus 1
but everything inside you knows
theres more than what youve heard
theres so much more than empty conversations
filled with empty words

chorus 1
and youre on fire when hes near you
youre on fire when he speaks
youre on fire burning at these mysteries

verse 2
give me one more time around
give me one more chance to see yeah
give me everything you are
give me one more chance to be near you

prechorus 2
when everything inside me
looks like everything i hate
you are the hope i have for change
you are the only chance ill take
you might also likechorus 2
when im on fire when youre near me
and im on fire when you speak
and im on fire burning at these mysteries
mysteries
mysteries

bridge
youre on fire
youre on fire
youre on fire
im standing on the edge of me
im standing on the edge of me
im standing on the edge of me
im standing on the edge of me
im standing on the edge of everything ive never been before
and ive been standing on the edge of me standing on the edge

chorus 2
and im on fire when youre near me
and im on fire when you speak
yeah im on fire burning at these mysteries
these mysteries
these mysteries yeah
youre a mystery yeah
youre a mystery1embed
